mapper.insert: insert into chat (chatroom_id, user_id, message_type, message) values (#{chatroomId}, #{userId}, #{messageType}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.chatroom_id, c.message, c.created_at, c.message_type, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chatroom_user cu WHERE cu.chatroom_id = c.chatroom_id AND cu.latest_read_time >= c.created_at ) AS read_count FROM chat c WHERE c.chatroom_id = #{roomId} AND c.created_at >= ( SELECT created_at FROM chatroom_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND chatroom_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY c.created_at;
select message from chat where chatroom_id=#{roomId} and message_type='TALK' order by created_at desc limit 1;
